page.title: 13RECREATION AND ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: There are also three fields used for rugby and football matches by small local clubs and in two cases a childrens' play area is on the same site.A third play area is near the new housing estate of the Avenues.These play areas have the usual swings, slides and roundabouts. The main entertainment facility within this section is the {'Metropole'} cinema.This is used as a theatre as well and the local dramatic and choral socities use it. Other centres of entertainment are the local clubs.Two of these have caberet shows and several hold discos and dances. Near the northern boundary of our block is the Cwmtillery Reservoir picnic site.There is also an artificial lake stocked with fish for anglers.
